articles.title: UCHealth offering antibody tests for anyone who wants to know if they have been exposed to COVID-19 - KRDO
articles.description: COLORADO SPRINGS, Colo. (KRDO) -- UCHealth is now offering antibody tests to anyone in Colorado. The antibody test helps determine if someone has been exposed to or has been sickened from COVID-19 in the past. Antibody testing is a blood draw test. For anyone…
